breakdowns.description: Allows addition of a new user with username, email, and age to the system.
conditions: Username must not duplicate any existing username
Age must be within the range 0-150

breakdowns.description: Allows updating the email address of an existing user.
Allows deactivation of a user account.

breakdowns.header: Calculate Average Age of Active Users
breakdowns.description: Calculates the average age of users who are currently active.
conditions: Only active users are included in the calculation

breakdowns.description: Categorizes users into age groups: youth (0-17), adult (18-64), senior (65+).
conditions: Age groups are defined as: youth (0-17), adult (18-64), senior (65+)
